{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ASUS |model=AiCam |revision=v1 |upc= |ean= |asin=B01EY64REK |price= |est_release_date=04/22/2015 |fcc_date= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=common |type=wireless camera |fcc_id= |pcb_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1.2 |pwr_conn=micro USB |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7620A |cpu1_cspeed=580 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla2=128 KiB |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |ram1=128 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram2=64 |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7620A |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none=true |eth_cpu= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed= |lan_ports= |wan_ports= |addl_chips=720p Image Sensor Module;OmniVision;OV9712;;1; ,,, 1080p 30fps H.264 Camera Codec with HDR ISP;GEO Semiconductor;MAX64380;;1; ,,, 16-Bit Mono Audio Voice Codec;Maxim;MAX9860;;1; ,,, Mono 2.6W Class D Audio Power Amplifier;Maxim;MAX98300;;1; |flags=IR LED, microphone, speaker |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os=Linux |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=ASUS |default_ssid_regex=^ASUS$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=AC:22:0B |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Smart Cloud NightView Camera}} :[https://www.asus.com/Networking/AiCam-2/ Product Page] {{•}} [https://www.asus.com/supportonly/AiCam/HelpDesk_Download/ Support page]
===Specifications=== *Model Name: AiCam *MP Date: 2015 *Chipset: [[MediaTek]] MT7620A WiSoC *Video Processor: ''GEO Semiconductor'' MAX64380 *Audio Codec/PA: ''Maxim'' MAX9860/MAX98300 (AAC) *Memory Size (Flash/RAM): :System: Flash: 128MB (NAND); RAM: 128MB (DDR2) :Video: Flash: 128KB; RAM: 64MB (DDR2) *Wireless: 802.11b/g/n, 2x internal antennas :Encryption: WEP, WPA2-PSK, WPA-PSK, WPS *Connectors: DC input (micro USB), MIC, Speaker *Microphone: 1x Built-in directional microphone *Speaker Power: 0.5W *Image Sensor: ''OmniVision'' OV9712 :720p/30fps, 1/4 inch, 3.3V/(Lux/sec) *Lens: Lens Field of View, Composition: IR cut :Sunny optical 3508B-200; Vertical: 57.7°; :Horizontal: 44.9°; Diagonal: 69.2°, F 2.8 *IR LED: 2x high power (6m distance) *Focus: Fixed focus, EFL 3.29 mm *Zoom: 4x digital zoom *Video protocols: H.264, MJPEG, CGI Command :HTTP/HTTPS, RTP/RTPS over UDP, TCP, HTTP *Recorded File type: MP4 :Audio File: MP3 (48KHz/16bits) *DC Power Adapter: AC Input / DC Output :AC input: 100~240V (50~60Hz) :DC outout: 5V with max. 1.2A current
===See also=== *[[ASUS AiCam 2]] - ''Smart Cloud Camera'' • [https://www.unifore.net/ip-video-surveillance/asus-aicam-alternative-d1000-smart-wifi-ip-camera.html PR] • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/AiCam-2/ PPage] *[[ASUS AF-200]] • 2.0MP (640x480) [0b05:1734] *[[ASUS MF-200]] • 2.0MP (640x480) *[[ASUS CX200]] • 2.0MP (640x480) LCD *[[ASUS DC-3120]] • 0.3MP (640x480) *[[ASUS HG100]] - ''Smart Home Gateway'' • [http://armdevices.net/2016/02/18/asus-hg100-rk3066-smart-home-gateway-via-zigbeewifi-bluetooth/ PR] • [https://mysmahome.com/news/4305/asus-debuts-smart-home-series-using-zigbee-2/ PR] • [https://mysmahome.com/product/6285/product-introduction-asus-smart-home-gateway-hg100/ PR] • [https://www.asus.com/sg/Internet-of-Things/ASUS-SmartHome-Gateway-HG100/ PPage] :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/MSQ-RK903 MSQ-RK903] (2015-04-02), CPU: ''Rockchip'' RK3066 @1.5GHz :Flash/RAM: 8/1GB, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, ZigBee, HDMI 2.0 (4K H.265) *ASUS Reco Classic Dash Cam (Full HD 1080p) - B0105TLZB8 *ASUS Reco Smart Dash Cam & Portable Cam - B075GHGNGX <!-- *ASUS AF-200 webcam USB 2.0 Black (90-HHB021A00GA00T) :640x480 pixels, 30fps, 4x, USB 2.0, Black, 1.5 m *ASUS MF-200 webcam USB 2.0 Black (90-HHB011A00GA00T) :640x480 pixels, 30fps, 4x, USB 2.0, Black, 1.5 m *ASUS Mimic CX200 Internet Camera webcam Silver (90QC01AN1NUAU30) :640x480 pixels, Silver, CMOS, 10-90%, 0-60°C, LCD *ASUS C3 webcam USB 2.0 Black (90YH0340-B2UA00) :1920x1080 pixels, 30fps, USB 2.0, Black, Clip *ASUS ROG Eye webcam USB Black (90YH01Z0-B2UA00) :1920x1080 pixels, 60fps, USB, Black, Clip, 1 m *ASUS ROG Eye S webcam USB Black (90YH0350-B2UA00) :5MP, 1920x1080 pixels, 60fps, 1080p, 1944p, USB, Black -->
